article: vincent `` the chin '' gigante , the powerful mafia boss who authorities said feigned insanity for decades in an attempt to avoid prosecution , ended the ruse monday by admitting he misled doctors evaluating him .
abstract: mob boss gigante ends insanity ruse pleads guilty to obstruction of justice
